name: Connect Dots
description: Connect Dots is a very unique puzzle game. You need to use your brain how to solve the puzzle. Great brain traning puzzle. Once you pick up the game it will be very easy to solve the puzzles. Just tap the dots and drag to connect the squential path for each shape. There are 48 levels in this game. There are more levels coming soon... You will have hours and hours fun with this game. We hope you will enjoy the Connect Dots.
